frontmatter.author: Blaz Zupan
frontmatter.title: Orange at GIS Ostrava
frontmatter.shortExcerpt: In late March 2019, we have been invited to present Orange during a GIS Ostrava conference.
frontmatter.longExcerpt: In late March 2019, we have been invited to present Orange during a GIS Ostrava conference. We have shown how to work with geospatial data in Orange.
